description: Raising of roof height and erection of side dormer roof extension with Juliet balcony, installation of 1no.x front rooflight  to facilitate loft conversion and  first floor side/rear extension and all associated works.
decision_conditions: The existing property is characterised by steep roof pitches and a well-proportioned roofscape in relation to the principal elevation. The  resultant property, by reason of the introduction of shallower pitches and a higher ratio of brickwork to roofslope, would fail to respect the appearance of the original property to the detriment of its appearance and that of the surrounding area. The proposal would be contrary to paragraph 127 of the NPPF (2019), Policy D3 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Core Strategy (2012).
Please provide a  Water Consumption Statement in line with Validation Local List requirements for new residential accommodation. See page 95 of the Local List for guidance.

The assessment of this application is based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.
